itemLabel: Francis Bertie, 1st Viscount Bertie of Thame

wikipedia_page.main: Francis Leveson Bertie, 1st Viscount Bertie of Thame,  ( "barty of tame"; 17 August 1844 – 26 September 1919) was a British diplomat. He was Ambassador to Italy between 1903 and 1905 and Ambassador to France between 1905 and 1918.
